title: Missing old lv up capsule
body: So I just lved from 35-36, got my capsule. But what about the previous one? I didn't get one from 34-35, and just submitted a ticket and have been waiting. But apparently a lot of people missed that, and recovering by tickets submission is really inefficient. Is there another way to give us back the missing capsules? Thanks. {{sticker:sg-poppy}}

replies.body: Well that's odd. No worries, I've got that capsule added for you if you double check your loot!
I have also had this problem when leveling up from 33 to 34, my friend leveled up to level 34 later that day, but got his. Plz help I just want the capsule.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uGZ2vmpN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-28T02:52:07.039+0000)
>
> Well that's odd. No worries, I've got that capsule added for you if you double check your loot!

Yes it has been added. Yall awesome. <3 {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
One of mine is missing too, I also submitted a ticket but it has yet to show up.

I had the same thing happen when I leveled from 31 to 32. I didn't receive a capsule or anything. I submitted 2 tickets to Riot and they deleted each one in short order without giving me a reply or fixing their BS problem.
